name: Let's KILL This GUY with HAMMERS!!!
name_original: Let's KILL This GUY with HAMMERS!!!
description:
I was just relaxing... until the NELWARDS KILLED MY FREAKING WIFE!



-SO NOW I'm motherFREAKING going to HECKING Kill them! this game is my life story. it's a top-rogue lite shooter area down rogue! Pretty sick right? Well it gets even friggin better.

We have these guys:
- Gameplay
- Graphics
- Good pjhysics.

Steam, assemble!
